author: smuzaffar
body: This is needed as https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47451 accidentally removed https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/171c27033f278ffb0ce89618c507c2ab93aa4c65#diff-a80883a369610558940339ceaf08ba44bad017298e5ba8795386a89193be8846 change which was needed for boost 1.87.0
title: Added algorithm header needed for std::transform
